It is an [[Islam]]ic concept rooted in the [[Qur'an]] and the [[Sunnah|practices]] of its founder [[Muhammad]].<ref> [[Encyclopaedia Britannica Ultimate Reference Suite 2005 DVD]]. Copyright Â© 1994-2004. Encyclopaedia Britannica, Inc.</ref>. This idea of contentment is expressed in two Qur'anic verses which discuss the contentment of [[God]] (Arabic ''Allah'') with believers and, conversely, of believers with God:
:''Allah was well pleased with the believers...'' ({{Quran-usc|48|18}})
:''Allah was well pleased with the believers...'' ({{Quran-usc|48|18}})
